Package xeno.remoting.web

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    JavaScriptCallback
    An interface for client side to execute JavaScript.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Browser
    An object to locate the specific client for calling JavaScript functions.
    JavaScriptFunction
    This is a JavaScript function object.
    MessageServlet
    A Servlet handling requests from the client side, encapsulating request & response data into JSON string, calling methods of the server side directly.
    ProxyJspTag
    The "proxy" JSP custom tag.
    Request
    A wrapped HttpServletRequest object, integrated and encapsulated the original HTTP Servlet request methods.
    Response
    A wrapped HttpServletResponse object, integrated and encapsulated the original HTTP Servlet response methods.
    Session
    A wrapped HttpSession object, integrated and encapsulated the original HTTP session methods.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    JsonDeserializationException
    An exception to be thrown when error occurs during deserializing a JSON string to the object.
    JsonSerializationException
    An exception to be thrown when error occurs during serializing an object to the JSON string.
